message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

The paper deals with image segmentation using a deep learning approach, specifically a 3D U-Net, to improve the quality of MRI scans of plant roots. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. Additionally, the paper involves optimization of the loss function, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of deep learning also suggests a potential overlap with neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the paper deals with image processing and analysis, which could fall under the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
